tool_description: This api will register you as per role and generate token and provides profile detials
name: Register and Login with Jwt Token
title: Register and Login with Jwt Token
tool_name: Register and Login with Jwt Token

api_list.name: Login a user
api_list.description: This endpoint will login  and generate a jwt token
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://register-and-login-with-jwt-token.p.rapidapi.com/user/login"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "register-and-login-with-jwt-token.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Register a User
api_list.description: This end point will register the user
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://register-and-login-with-jwt-token.p.rapidapi.com/register"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "register-and-login-with-jwt-token.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
